resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

One rank represents your step count rank, while the other represents your running rank. Your step count rank can be improved by increasing your daily step count and completing challenges. Your runnning rank can only be increased by completing running challenges. The runnning challenges can be completed as many times as you want.

To add a friend, use the navigation drawer to go to the friend page and then tap on the magnifying glass icon. Enter the email address of the friend you want to add. If they are found, a popup will show you their account details and you will be given an option to add them.
Yes, you can change your account information by using the navigation drawer in the top left of the screen to navigate to the profile page and tapping on any of the pencil icons.

The stats page shows your step count information over the past 7 days, including today. Each bar represents a day. The stats page also shows the total number of steps recorded since you signed up, and the average steps taken per day since you signed up.

Your email address is only visibile to your friends and is not made public. Your email is only used by other users to add you as a friend. On public data lists such as leaderboards, only your name is shown. No other data is made public other than your challenge times.

Your data is not being used for any external purposes. This application is simply a side project. I am not making any money from this application. For more information on my motivations, check out the "About" page.
